skillType.name: Wall
skillType.desc: Absorbs damage dealt to the Commander

skillType.name: Armor
skillType.desc: Prevents damage taken by attacks

skillType.name: Counter
skillType.desc: When damaged by an attack, deal damage to attacker

skillType.name: Heal
skillType.desc: Heals a random allied Assault card
skillType.desc_faction: Heals a random allied y Assault card
skillType.desc_all_faction: Heals all allied y Assault cards

skillType.name: Rally
skillType.desc: Boosts Attack of a random allied Assault card
skillType.desc_all: Boosts Attack of all allied Assault cards
skillType.desc_faction: Boosts Attack of a random allied y Assault card
skillType.desc_all_faction: Boosts Attack of all allied y Assault cards

skillType.name: Strike
skillType.desc: Deals damage to a random enemy Assault card
skillType.desc_all: Deals damage to all enemy Assault cards
skillType.desc_faction: Deals damage to a random enemy y Assault card
skillType.desc_all_faction: Deals damage to all enemy y Assault cards

skillType.name: Weaken
skillType.desc: Reduces Attack of a random enemy Assault card
skillType.desc_all: Reduces the Attack of all enemy Assault cards
skillType.desc_faction: Reduces the Attack of a random enemy y Assault card
skillType.desc_all_faction: Reduces the attack of all enemy y Assault cards

skillType.name: Siege
skillType.desc: Deals damage to a random enemy Structure card
skillType.desc_all: Deals damage to all enemy Structure cards

skillType.name: Pierce
skillType.desc: Reduces the effect of Damage Prevention

skillType.name: Poison
skillType.desc: Poisons enemy damaged by this card, dealing additional damage during the End phase

skillType.name: Leech
skillType.desc: Heals this card as it deals Attack damage to an Assault card

skillType.name: Evade
skillType.desc: Avoids enemy skills

skillType.name: Berserk
skillType.desc: When this unit deals attack damage, Attack is permanently boosted

skillType.name: Enfeeble
skillType.desc: Increase Damage dealt to a random enemy Assault card
skillType.desc_all: Increase Damage dealt to all enemy Assault cards

skillType.name: Protect
skillType.desc: Reduces Damage dealt to a random allied Assault card
skillType.desc_all: Reduces Damage dealt to all allied Assault cards
skillType.desc_faction: Reduces Damage dealt to a random allied y Assault card
skillType.desc_all_faction: Reduces Damage dealt to all allied y Assault cards

skillType.name: Enhance
skillType.desc: Increase effect of skill on a random allied Assault card
skillType.desc_all: Increase effect of skill on all allied Assault cards
skillType.desc_faction: Increase effect of skill on a random allied y Assault card
skillType.desc_all_faction: Increase effect of skill on all allied y Assault cards

skillType.name: Jam
skillType.desc: Random enemy unit doesn't attack or activate abilities on its next turn. Jams every x turns.
skillType.desc_all: Enemy units doesn't attack or activate abilities on their next turn. Jams every x turns.

skillType.name: Corrosive
skillType.desc: Corrode unit that damages this by attack. That unit loses Attack if it attacks, otherwise loses Corrode.

skillType.name: Inhibit
skillType.desc: Inhibits enemy Assault damaged by this card. Inhibited units avoid their own friendly skills.

skillType.name: Flurry
skillType.desc: After this card attacks, Activate skills and Attack again. Flurry every X turns.

skillType.name: Valor
skillType.desc: If this card were to attack an Assault unit with higher Attack, gain Attack this turn.

skillType.name: Overload
skillType.desc: Affected ally Assault cards cannot have their skills avoided or prevented.
skillType.desc_faction: Affected ally y Assault cards cannot have their skills avoided or prevented.

skillType.name: Legion
skillType.desc: Turn the page, wash your hands. C.
